name: Hellgate Senigallia
description:
A video game developed from the brilliant idea of ​​Rick Dope, set in the charming town of Senigallia in Italy.

The Jamburini have taken control of the city, everything lies in chaos and only you can change the situation!

Fight in the catacombs of the Chiesa del Portone, face hordes of zombies in the Coop gardens, enter the supermarket and thwart the attack of vegan satanists and much more in this FIRST EPISODE of "HELLGATE SENIGALLIA".

The game uses the Doom graphics engine, the graphics have that retro style reminiscent of 90s games such as Doom and Duke Nukem with extremely enjoyable graphics innovations!

IF YOU DO NOT TOLERATE BLASPHEMIA, VIOLENCE OR BLACK HUMOR, exit this page immediately, this game is suitable for an ADULT and MATURE audience, NOT RECOMMENDED UNDER 18 YEARS.

The following video game is sponsored by the videogame newspaper ElCartelDelGaming.
